file_content.text: We're here! We made it!
Thanks, Major. We'll drop Gouge off at a holding cell and get back to base. See you around.
Not looking forward to tracking down that bloodthirsty creep again, but I will. The pilots and I can make it from here--see you around.
Yeah. Look, we'll take our own way back... don't want to call too much attention to ourselves, traveling in a big group. We'll, uh, we'll be seeing you.
Keep your eyes open for Imps or prisoners.
Freeze!
Take it easy, Symo. They're Republic soldiers--they must be here to help.
Havoc Squad--we're here to pull you out.
That's affirmative.
Havoc Squad? One of you have an uncle in the Senate or something?
Not me. Does this mean we can finally get out of this place?
Get your eyes checked, Symo. She's with the Republic. She must have come to lend us a hand.
Relax, Symo. He's with the Republic--he must have come to help us.
I've come to get you out of here.
That's affirmative.
Well, what are we waiting for?
You've got the best in the Republic to get you out of here.
It's your lucky day.
Sounds good to me! Let's go!
Point that at me again, and it'll be the last thing you ever do.
Symo is lucky I didn't shoot.
All right, all right, I'm sorry. Does this mean we can get out of here?
We're not going anywhere. I swore an oath to keep the prisoners on Belsavis locked up. I'm not gonna leave and let this scum escape.
I go free, whether you stay or go. Run now, and maybe I won't find you once I'm out.
I'm under orders to bring all Dagger Wing personnel in. There's no time for this.
We need to go.
In Dagger Wing, we do what we say. And we said we'd help Brok hold this ground.
I can see why you'd want to stay with such an upstanding guy.
Charming.
Gouge is scum. I'd rather die than let someone like him get loose.
Nobody asked you anything.
Shut up. [Hit Gouge]
Move again and I'll drop you, scumbag.
Always such a charmer.
Major, that was uncalled for. The prisoner is hardly a threat.
Aggressive captive identified--pacification protocols on standby!
Come on, boss, you can do better than that. Watch.
A waste of energy, Major. Let us conserve our strength for the journeys ahead.
This is moronic. Who cares about one prisoner? There are hundreds of them running loose!
You volunteered to help me guard my post. You don't want to stay, fine--but I keep my word.
Brok's right. Dagger Wing agreed to help hold this ground. If we die, we die--that's the job.
You can always lock Gouge up in another cell, Brok.
Bring the prisoner with us.
Brok, if you stay here, you're just going to get yourself and three good pilots killed.
Leave the prisoner.
If this scumbag weren't breathing, you'd have no reason to stay, right?
What if the prisoner dies?
Are... are you serious? You want to kill him in cold blood?
Whoa there, Major. Offing this guy isn't part of the mission.
Major. This is an unarmed prisoner--we cannot kill him as a matter of convenience.
Our mission is priority one. Any obstacles to completing that mission should be removed.
Your mission--not mine. I'm a guard, not an executioner.
Why not? It'd save us a lot of time.
Yuun sees no cause for ending this being's life.
Gouge got a life sentence, not death. Not our place to change that.
We'll put Gouge in a cell somewhere else.
Fine. Bring him with us.
It's going to take a lot longer to get back if we have to drag him along with us.
Hmm, yes. Code 97-C provides for emergency prisoner transfer in conditions like these. Let's proceed.
Very well! Rest assured, Major--I will prevent any attempt at escape with utmost efficiency.
Shooting him would've been a lot easier.
Hmm. A wise solution, converging the divergent into mutual accomplishment.
It'll be a hard run, but if you get us back to the entrance, we can take Gouge the rest of the way.
We'll follow your lead, Major. Let's get out of here.
Staying here will just get you and these three pilots killed.
Leave him here.
This is war. Trading four good men for one prisoner is a waste we can't afford.
Hmm. I don't like it, but you've got a point. There are bigger problems right now than this prisoner. Let's move.
I'm going to find you, Brok. When I'm out. You, me and a blade... we'll all get very cozy together.
I'll be seeing you, Gouge. Let's go, soldier.
I don't waste effort on scum.
We travel light. [Kill Gouge]
Hope you're happy now, Major.
Major! Have you lost your mind?
We've wasted enough time and resources here--can we move out, Major?
Can we go now?
Yuun does not understand your decision, sir. This seemed unnecessary.
You just shot him... just like that.
Damage is done. Let's just get out of here before things get any worse.
